text:
Tigerspike | Senior iOS Engineer| FULL TIME | Goodge St, London | https://tigerspike.com/

Tigerspike a growing Digital Products company with 9 offices around the world (including Sydney, NY, Dubai & Singapore). We work across a range of industries on consumer & enterprise apps with clients such as Emirates, New Look, The UN & Westfield.

We take our clients from concept to architecture and through to development and support. These relationships can be as short as four weeks but often lead to a continuous delivery model which can be as long as two years.We follow all Scrum rituals and have a strong focus on code quality, following SOLID principles and Clean code guidelines.

Take a look at the role for more details: http://bit.ly/2Afezte or drop me an email: michelle.coulson@tigerspike.com
